about_the_game:
The DLC Tales Of OSM includes the playable original soundtrack of the story mode of Old School Musical made by chiptune artists such as Dubmood, Yponeko, Hello World & Zabutom.

Part 1:
  • 1 - Yponeko - Childhood
  • 2 - Yponeko - Home
  • 3 - Yponeko - BIG MAMA
  • 4 - Yponeko - Tutorial
  • 5 - Yponeko - Before Training
  • 6 - Yponeko - Marmite
